pages.text: There are several things to consider when constructing a habitation for a mount. Many mounts will appreciate an environ that provides both enough room to wander and a place to shelter from the elements.$(br2)To this point, when not accompanying a rider or resting, mounts will naturally wander near their rider's last dismount location.

$(br2)This is especially relevant to flying mounts as they may be permitted to freely fly around their corral without risk of them straying too far and becoming lost.$(br2)$(o)(All mounts will wander within a vertical 16x16 block square centered on their last dismount point if not sitting/following their owner)
